text: "Not Like Us" is a diss track written and recorded by the American rapper Kendrick Lamar. It was released on May 4, 2024, through Interscope Records. It was released during a feud between Lamar and Canadian rapper Drake. The lyrics talk about the allegations of Drake's pedophilia and sexual misconduct, while also criticizing his cultural identity and relationships with artists in Atlanta, Georgia. "Not Like Us" was successful and broke many streaming recordsâ€”most of which were previously held by Drake. "Not Like Us" is the most decorated song in Grammy Awards history, winning all five of its nominations at the 67th ceremony: Record of the Year, Song of the Year, Best Rap Performance, Best Rap Song, and Best Music Video. ==References== Category:2024 songs Category:Kendrick Lamar songs Category:Grammy Award-winning songs
title: Not Like Us
